title: International Business Practical English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills (daily conversation and workplace expressions), understanding of business environments, and grammar/vocabulary knowledge at elementary level or higher
context.additional_context: Focused on practical communication skills acquisition based on real business scenarios for learners in administrator/leader roles. Content structured with smartphone-centric access in mind (mobile-optimized text, audio/video materials). Includes tasks to improve learners' writing and reading comprehension abilities.
